statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time = '10:00';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as num_appointments FROM appointments WHERE patient_id IN (456,789) GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_appointments > 1
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND reminder_sent = FALSE
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time >= '08:00:00' AND appointment_time < '12:00:00' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(id) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT name, email FROM patients ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' AND reminder_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_condition='Critical';
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_time, reminder_message FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_condition = 'COVID-19';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Patients.patient_age >= 50;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, condition FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT condition_name, description FROM conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patients.patient_name, conditions.condition_name FROM patients JOIN conditions ON patients.condition = conditions.condition_name;

SELECT patients.patient_name, patients.age, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC, patients.age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, condition FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, condition FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, Doctors.name AS doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.patient_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT name, age, condition FROM Patients WHERE condition = 'Fever' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, Appointments.appointment_date, Appointments.appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Patients.age < 40;

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, Reminders.reminder_date, Reminders.reminder_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Reminders ON Appointments.appointment_id = Reminders.appointment_id;
